SELECT t1.id_key,t1.request_no,t1.BARCODE,t1.RFID_NO, CASE t1.TRANS_TYPE WHEN '10' THEN '入库' WHEN '15' THEN '出库' WHEN '16' THEN '物料移动' WHEN '20' THEN '胎胚入硫化机' WHEN '35' THEN '检验' WHEN '80' THEN '喷涂' WHEN '90' THEN '物流货笼装配' END AS TRANS_TYPE, CASE t1.RESULT WHEN '20' THEN '不良' WHEN '30' THEN '合格' END AS RESULT, CASE t1.MES_STATUS WHEN '20' THEN '已读取' WHEN '90' THEN '异常状况' END AS MES_STATUS, CASE t1.EQU_STATUS WHEN '10' THEN '初始' END AS EQU_STATUS, t1.TRANS_TIME,t1.DESTINATION,t1.REMARKS,t1.UPDATETIME FROM view_material_event t1
T1.TRANS_TYPE = #where.TRANS_TYPE#
T1.REQUEST_NO LIKE '%'||#where.REQUEST_NO#||'%'
T1.RFID_NO LIKE '%'||#where.RFID_NO#||'%'
T1.DESTINATION LIKE '%'||#where.DESTINATION#||'%'
T1.TRANS_TIME >= #where.START_TIME#
T1.TRANS_TIME < #where.END_TIME# + 1
ORDER BY t1.request_no

select t1.* from view_material_event t1
T1.ID_KEY = #where.ID_KEY#

SELECT '10' AS sskey, '入库' AS ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '15' AS sskey, '出库' AS ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '16' AS sskey, '物料移动' AS ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '20' AS sskey, '胎胚入硫化机' AS ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '35' AS sskey, '检验' AS ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '80' AS sskey, '喷涂' AS ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '90' AS sskey, '物流货笼装配' AS ssValue FROM dual
